show.name: Wicked Grounds
show.subtitle: Recordings from the Wicked Grounds Cafe, 289 8th Street, San Francisco, CA
show.html_heading:
Bi-Monthly Podcasts about BDSM, Sex, and more from the Wicked Grounds cafe in San Francisco, CA, USA

Do you want real talk?

The Wicked Grounds podcast is a collection of open converstations captured live at Wicked Grounds Cafe. Subjects can range from sex, relationships, politices, geekery, movies, more sex, you name it.

episodes.title: WG1: Episode 1, part 1 - Welcome to Wicked Grounds with Siouxsie Q
episodes.subtitle: Our first podcast
episodes.summary: In our first episode, Ryan and Roo describe the history of the cafe and speak with special guest Siouxsie Q about some of her favorite things.

episodes.title: WG2: Episode 1, part 2 - Siouxie Q, Q and A
episodes.subtitle: Siouxie Q and questions from the world.
episodes.summary: In this episode, Roo and Ryan talk to Siouxie about Food, ElfQuest, Virginity, Theater, and take questions from the audience.

episodes.title: WG3: Episode 2, Part 1 - Dr. Carol Queen
episodes.subtitle: Dr. Carol Queen (Good Vibrations, Center for Sex and Culture)
episodes.summary: In this episode, Roo and Ryan talk to Carol Queen, Author, editor, sociologist, CCO, and staff sexologist at Good Vibrations.

episodes.title: WG4: Episode 2, Part 2 - Dr. Carol Queen
episodes.subtitle: Dr. Carol Queen (Good Vibrations, Center for Sex and Culture)
episodes.summary: Continuing our talk wiht Dr. Carol Queen (Good Vibrations, Center for Sex and Culture)
